movies.title: The Giant Gila Monster
movies.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

movies.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
movies.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: John Wick, a retired hitman, seeks vengeance after the death of his wife, leading to a relentless rampage through the criminal underworld.

movies.title: Sonic 2
movies.description: Sonic and his new ally Tails race against Dr. Robotnik to find a powerful emerald in the Amazon jungle, encountering mysterious creatures along the way.
